name: Cupcake
greetingText: I really like this name btw!
wishText: May you get the best of everything! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something for the most lovely person on earth
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it :p .
replayText: Or click, if you want to WATCH it again.
